name: UpdateDeploymentBranchPolicy
description:
Update a deployment branch policy for a GitHub environment.

This tool updates a deployment branch policy for a specified environment in a GitHub repository. It requires authentication with an access token that has the `repo` scope, or for GitHub Apps, the `administration:write` permission.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The GitHub username or organization name of the repository owner. It is case insensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: environment_name
parameters.description: The name of the environment for which the deployment branch policy is being updated.

parameters.name: branch_policy_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the branch policy to be updated.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the branch policy.

parameters.name: branch_name_pattern
parameters.description: Pattern that branches must match to deploy to the environment. Wildcards won't match '/'. See Ruby File.fnmatch for syntax.

value_schema.description:
The name pattern that branches must match in order to deploy to the environment.

Wildcard characters will not match `/`. For example, to match branches that begin with `release/` and contain an additional single slash, use `release/*/*`.
For more information about pattern matching syntax, see the [Ruby File.fnmatch documentation](https://ruby-doc.org/core-2.5.1/File.html#method-c-fnmatch).

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: branch_policy_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the branch policy.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the branch policy.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description:
The name pattern that branches must match in order to deploy to the environment.

Wildcard characters will not match `/`. For example, to match branches that begin with `release/` and contain an additional single slash, use `release/*/*`.
For more information about pattern matching syntax, see the [Ruby File.fnmatch documentation](https://ruby-doc.org/core-2.5.1/File.html#method-c-fnmatch).

value_schema.description:
The name pattern that branches must match in order to deploy to the environment.

Wildcard characters will not match `/`. For example, to match branches that begin with `release/` and contain an additional single slash, use `release/*/*`.
For more information about pattern matching syntax, see the [Ruby File.fnmatch documentation](https://ruby-doc.org/core-2.5.1/File.html#method-c-fnmatch).

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
